@greengrasstree, hardly anyone plans on getting caught, but that does not stop people from finding out.

Deku is doing it because he's in love or at least infatuated with Mitsuki; she was the one who made him a sex addict in the first place. Mitsuki is doing it because she's a whore. It would be bad news if someone found out, but they don't plan on being caught.

I have to ask, why is Midoriya doing this? This seems like a pretty idiotic thing to do as a hero-in-training. If the school finds out, or the public for that matter, he will be expelled and barred from becoming a hero, which is his life-long dream. That, and Mitsuki would become known as a possible pedophile (we know she is a pedophile). Overall, this seems pretty idiotic on both of their parts. This is from a logical standpoint, mind you. As a tragedy, it is not bad.

Word of Deku's penis even spreads outside of his school, and he'll fuck girls from other schools like Camie, villains like Toga and Pro Heroes like Mirko. He'll also fuck his own mother again. To anyone confused this is like the 4th installment in this series Juna has done. “My Harem Academia” has been going on for quite a while now. So if you haven’t read the others you’re missing out on a lot of really hot context. I recommend checking out Juna’s other works and if you can afford it check Juna’s Twitter to support their Patreon. It’s the only Patreon I’ve ever subbed to, and I do NOT regret it. You get access to a bunch of early sketches/rough drafts/pre releases/etc and other really sexy stuff that never make it to this site. You also directly fund sequels for your favorites such as “Annoying Step Sister Needs to be Scolded”, “My Harem Academia”, “My 40 Year Old Sexfriend Naomi-San”, and other original works! Check those out if you haven’t and consider supporting Juna’s Patreon! It doesn’t break the bank and you won’t regret it with all the exclusive & early access stuff you get!!

Deku was fucking her before all the other girls, so it's not a surprise for him to go back to her. I wonder how this will end, though; I don't think Mitsuki can go back to her family in this state, but I don't want her family to fall apart. Deku is probably gonna realize that he needs to let her go. She was my favorite so it's a shame, but it's for the best; he is going to ruin her lol. However, I'm curious whatever happened to Deku's mom; she was the first girl he ever had sex with as a kid. I can see this trilogy ending with her trying to seduce him again, just after Deku has made peace with all of his fuck buddies and returned to a normal life. Not sure if I want a full follow-up on that incest plot; maybe it should just be a gag ending.
